text: Miguel Alberto Romero Lugo (born February 17, 1970) is a Puerto Rican lawyer and politician. He is the Mayor of San Juan since 2021. He was also Secretary of Labor and Human Resources of Puerto Rico from 2009 to 2012. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of San Juan, Puerto Rico Category:Puerto Rican lawyers
title: Miguel Romero
